dialogs.name: I am you - ax
dialogs.dialog: Ask not whose blood is it, but whose blood flows in the veins of the arms that swing it?

dialogs.name: I am you - book
dialogs.dialog: You can learn a lot from a book. Follow your instinct. Keep your eyes open. Happy dreaming.

dialogs.name: I am you
dialogs.dialog: What you see in dreams is influenced by your psychic powers. Follow the clues.
